Description:
fast love is the fifth opening theme song of the Monogatari Series Second Season. It is a solo version used as the opening theme for Hitagi End. It was included in the single release of "Kogarashi Sentiment".
It was not used during the TV Broadcast.

#Trivia.text: The term "fast" (ファースト, fāsuto) in the title has the same pronunciation as "first" (ファースト, fāsuto); so "fast love" is a play on "first love", since Kaiki, narrator of Koimonogatari, suggests that he was Senjougahara's love.
